a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball I

p.k: The GI / The Kiss / The Party / The Refund / The Robot / The Picnic / The Goons / The Secret Gumball and Darwin’s martial arts costumes make them a laughing stock at school. / Gumball is traumatised when accidentally kissed on the mouth by his Grandma JoJo. / Gumball and Darwin are invited to a high school party and have to bring a date! / Gumball and Darwin unsuccessfully attempt to get a refund for their computer game. / Gumball discovers that Bobert is planning to take over his identity and replace him! / Gumball and Darwin barely survive a school picnic in the Forest of Doom. / Gumball sets out to win his Dad back by winning a blindfolded “dumb” race. / Gumball almost loses his mind trying to guess Darwin’s secret.
